Text: Its in hebrew....subtitles can be switched off or on... subs are english...spanish...romanian...portugese...french
have you guys found a way around the whole subtitles thing on the PS3?
install PS3 media server on PC and enjoy. (the app is 100% free and idiot proof)
I use headphones. The right side I hear the voices and the left side the music. Tested in 2 computers with different codec packs.
